title: Jelani Day, Bitterman's New Business, Steve's Blue Denim, Pimpin's Picks and more.
itunes:title: Jelani Day, Bitterman's New Business, Steve's Blue Denim, Pimpin's Picks and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO must draw the line for a lady that is between control freak and stalker. The ladies talk about Megan Thee Stallion's new job. Fool #2 got a new company for people with VERY special needs. There are opinions of the blue denim suit that Big Dog rocked on his Facebook show STEVE on Watch and he really don't give a damn. Our favorite gentleman of leisure is here to give us his picks and points out the surprise upset game of the week. Is $192 million enough for you from a lottery or nah? Comedy Roulette gives us the things a vegan would say to sugar coat the obvious. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve wraps up the week with a friendly reminder. Stop hanging around people that is blocking your destiny.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
